revision.text:
[[File:PokeCoin.png|thumb|200px|A Poké Dollar]]
==Details==
===Description=== The basic currency of PokéClicker. They are obtained by defeating enemies and are spent on various '''[[Items]]''' ===Rates===
The following table presents the relevant information for gaining Pokedollars. Routes are listed together with gyms of a particular region, and both provide rates of Pokedollars per defeated Pokémon.
These tables assume that # You can defeat the Pokémon in 1-shot # You have the [[Amulet Coin]] at max level (5)
The columns include all the various combinations of gaining Pokedollars with items and oak items that apply a bonus to money gained.
* Average = Average Pokedollars/Pokémon defeated w/ no modifier active * (AC/LI) Average = Average Pokedollars/Pokémon defeated w/ Amulet Coin or [[Lucky Incense]] active * (AC*LI) Average = Average Pokedollars/Pokémon defeated w/ Amulet Coin and Lucky Incense active
==== Optimization ====
It is always most efficient to farm money on the highest strength route when idling. When actively playing, it is almost always most efficient to gain Pokedollars by defeating the highest strength gym that can be one-shot.
==== Kanto ==== {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed wikitable sortable" |- ! Route/Gym !! Max Health !! Average !! (AC/LI) Average !! (AC*LI) Average |- | 1 || 20 || 22 || 33 || 49 |- | 22 || 66 || 26 || 39 || 59 |- | 2 || 184 || 31 || 47 || 70 |- | 3 || 382 || 37 || 55 || 83 |- | 4 || 671 || 47 || 70 || 106 |- | 24 || 1,065 || 57 || 86 || 129 |- | 25 || 1,574 || 68 || 102 || 153 |- | 5 || 2,206 || 79 || 118 || 178 |- | 6 || 2,972 || 90 || 135 || 202 |- | 11 || 3,880 || 101 || 151 || 227 |- | 9 || 4,939 || 112 || 168 || 252 |- | 10 || 6,155 || 123 || 185 || 278 |- | 8 || 7,537 || 135 || 202 || 303 |- | 7 || 9,091 || 146 || 219 || 329 |- | 12 || 10,825 || 158 || 237 || 355 |- | 13 || 12,745 || 169 || 254 || 381 |- | 14 || 14,858 || 181 || 272 || 408 |- | 15 || 17,170 || 193 || 290 || 435 |- | 16 || 19,687 || 205 || 307 || 461 |- | 17 || 22,415 || 217 || 325 || 488 |- | 18 || 25,360 || 229 || 343 || 515 |- | 19 || 28,527 || 241 || 362 || 543 |- | 20 || 31,923 || 253 || 380 || 570 |- | 21 || 35,552 || 265 || 398 || 598 |- | 23 || 39,421 || 278 || 417 || 625 |- | Pewter || 1,554 || 125 || 188 || 281 |- | Cerulean || 6,800 || 250 || 375 || 562 |- | Vermillion || 37,000 || 1,000 || 1,500 || 2,250 |- | Celadon || 38,810 || 500 || 750 || 1,125 |- | Saffron || 28,400 || 833 || 1,250 || 1,875 |- | Fuschia || 37,430 || 875 || 1,313 || 1,969 |- | Cinnabar || 50,290 || 1,667 || 2,500 || 3,750 |- | Viridian || 55,000 || 1,200 || 1,800 || 2,700 |- | Elite Lorelei || 60,250 || 1,500 || 2,250 || 3,375 |- | Elite Bruno || 60,250 || 1,500 || 2,250 || 3,375 |- | Elite Agatha || 60,250 || 1,500 || 2,250 || 3,375 |- | Elite Lance || 66,000 || 1,500 || 2,250 || 3,375 |- | Champion Blue || 70,000 || 1,667 || 2,500 || 3,750 |}

It is always most efficient to farm money on the highest strength route when idling. When actively playing, it is almost always most efficient to gain Pokedollars by defeating the highest strength gym that can be one-shot.

[[File:PokeCoin.png|thumb|200px|A Poké Dollar]]
==Details==
===Description=== The basic currency of PokéClicker. They are obtained by defeating enemies and are spent on various '''[[Items]]''' ===Rates===
The following table presents the relevant information for gaining Pokedollars. Routes are listed together with gyms of a particular region, and both provide rates of Pokedollars per defeated Pokémon.
These tables assume that # You can defeat the Pokémon in 1-shot # You have the [[Amulet Coin]] at max level (5)
The columns include all the various combinations of gaining Pokedollars with items and oak items that apply a bonus to money gained.
* AV = Average Pokedollars/Pokémon defeated w/ no modifier active * (AC/LI)AV = Average Pokedollars/Pokémon defeated w/ Amulet Coin or Lucky Incense active * (AC*LI)AV = Average Pokedollars/Pokémon defeated w/ Amulet Coin and Lucky Incense active
==== Optimization ====
It is always most efficient to farm money on the highest strength route when idling. When actively playing, it is almost always most efficient to gain Pokedollars by defeating the highest strength gym that can be one-shot.
==== Kanto ==== {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed wikitable sortable" |- ! Route/Gym !! AV !! (AC/LI)AV !! (AC*LI)AV |- | 1 || 22 || 33 || 49 |- | 22 || 26 || 39 || 59 |- | 2 || 31 || 47 || 70 |- | 3 || 37 || 55 || 83 |- | 4 || 47 || 70 || 106 |- | 24 || 57 || 86 || 129 |- | 25 || 68 || 102 || 153 |- | 5 || 79 || 118 || 178 |- | 6 || 90 || 135 || 202 |- | 11 || 101 || 151 || 227 |- | 9 || 112 || 168 || 252 |- | 10 || 123 || 185 || 278 |- | 8 || 135 || 202 || 303 |- | 7 || 146 || 219 || 329 |- | 12 || 158 || 237 || 355 |- | 13 || 169 || 254 || 381 |- | 14 || 181 || 272 || 408 |- | 15 || 193 || 290 || 435 |- | 16 || 205 || 307 || 461 |- | 17 || 217 || 325 || 488 |- | 18 || 229 || 343 || 515 |- | 19 || 241 || 362 || 543 |- | 20 || 253 || 380 || 570 |- | 21 || 265 || 398 || 598 |- | 23 || 278 || 417 || 625 |- | Pewter || 125 || 188 || 281 |- | Cerulean || 250 || 375 || 562 |- | Vermillion || 1000 || 1500 || 2250 |- | Celadon || 500 || 750 || 1125 |- | Saffron || 833 || 1250 || 1875 |- | Fuschia || 875 || 1313 || 1969 |- | Cinnabar || 1667 || 2500 || 3750 |- | Viridian || 1200 || 1800 || 2700 |- | Elite Lorelei || 1500 || 2250 || 3375 |- | Elite Bruno || 1500 || 2250 || 3375 |- | Elite Agatha || 1500 || 2250 || 3375 |- | Elite Lance || 1500 || 2250 || 3375 |- | Champion Blue || 1667 || 2500 || 3750 |}
